entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening with 40 percent chance of rain showers late this evening and after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 3.
